# dispatchType

**Instance Property**

The strategy for dispatching any compute commands encoded in the compute pass.

## Declaration

```swift
var dispatchType: MTLDispatchType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default dispatch type is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDispatchType/serial].
